dedicatedCloud_dashboard_update_descript: This operation will make your vSphere platform administration unavailable for around two hours.
dedicatedCloud_dashboard_update_info: The update date will be sent to you by email. You can change it at any time, before its expiry date.
dedicatedCloud_dashboard_update_insuffic: You do not have sufficient rights to perform this operation.
dedicatedCloud_dashboard_update_error: An error has occurred attempting to schedule the vSphere update: {{ message }}
dedicatedCloud_dashboard_update_success: The {{sourceMajor}} (build {{sourceBuild}}) vSphere update to version {{targetMajor}} (build {{targetBuild}}) is scheduled. Please note that the task may take up to 30 seconds to schedule. Track this operation
